property.name: dfs.namenode.servicerpc-address
property.description: This is the RPC address for the namenode. This address is used by services like the datanodes to connect to the namenode.

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address
property.description: This is the HTTP address for the namenode web user interface.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: This property defines the replication factor of the data blocks in HDFS.

property.name: dfs.blocksize
property.description: This property defines block size for files in HDFS (bytes).
